TITLE: Reset your password
SUB_TITLE: Thank you for verifying your account. Please enter your new password.
SYSTEM_ERROR: We’re sorry, something went wrong. Please try again.
UPDATE_FAIL_ERROR: We’re sorry, something went wrong with this attempt. Please try again.

ERRORS.LENGTH: Your password must be {{ min }} to {{ max }} characters long.
ERRORS.POLICY: Your password must contain at least one character from at least 3 different groups, as explained in our password policy.
ERRORS.GENERIC: We're sorry, your new password does not comply with our policy. Please try again.
ERRORS.PII_DATA: Password cannot contain first name, last name or email address.
